Replace.Text: Replacing the Holy Land, no pre-technology is required. After completion, you will get a builder, and you will get a standard adjacency bonus from adjacent farms and plantations. , Xiashe Spring Palace, and Xiashe Qiugong Four Shrines were built around Suwa Lake. There are huge pillars standing in the territory of the Four Society. When Batik attacked three years ago, a large number of the same pillars appeared on the line connecting the Four Society. The pillars formed a barrier, preventing Batik from entering its interior.
When adjacent to a lake, Suwa Shrine gets 2 [ICON_Culture] culture, 4 [ICON_Faith] faith and 5 [ICON_Tourism] tourism achievements

Replacing the Holy Land, no pre-technology is required. After completion, you will get a builder, and you will get a standard adjacency bonus from adjacent farms and plantations. , Xiashe Spring Palace, and Xiashe Qiugong Four Shrines were built around Suwa Lake. There are huge pillars standing in the territory of the Four Society. When Batik attacked three years ago, a large number of the same pillars appeared on the line connecting the Four Society. The pillars formed a barrier, preventing Batik from entering its interior.

Farms can be built in grassland hills and plain hills. After cities build aqueducts, farms can be built in frozen soil and deserts. Farms add 1 [ICON_Food] food, and plantations add 1 [ICON_Production] productivity
My non-farm son loves farming... this is destiny. Ah Shui also worked hard together, so he must be able to understand the greatness of agriculture.
Scramble! Hero Shiratori Utano, rush to the battlefield!
Likes civs with lots of improved tiles, dislikes civs with lots of unimproved tiles

I can't imagine what the future will be like. But it will definitely be the same as now, accomplishing nothing, not being noticed by anyone, and living silently through life. [NEWLINE]So for Mizuto, the encounter with Utano was very shocking. [NEWLINE] Utano is not timid, standing in front of everyone and leading others. [NEWLINE] No matter what the surroundings look like, she will never hesitate, and dignifiedly walk the path she believes in without turning back. [NEWLINE]Before you know it, she's at the center of everyone's attention. [NEWLINE]It's the complete opposite of myself——Shui thinks so.
My non-farm son loves farming... this is destiny. Ah Shui also worked hard together, so he must be able to understand the greatness of agriculture.
Likes civs with lots of improved tiles, dislikes civs with lots of unimproved tiles

No matter what kind of hardships and hardships one suffers, [NEWLINE] people will be able to stand up——[NEWLINE] this is the sustenance. [NEWLINE]So she always faces forward. [NEWLINE]Smile all the time. [NEWLINE]In this closed, unreasonable world,[NEWLINE]she shines brighter than anything.

"...Now, there is another oracle. It is said to be the last oracle..." [NEWLINE] "What is it about?" [NEWLINE] Utano asked gently to the sobbing Mizuto. [NEWLINE] "It's not easy to protect Suwa for three years... Utanon and I held back the enemy, and Shikoku laid the foundation for fighting the enemy..."[NEWLINE]"That's it..."[NEWLINE]Suwa It is the bait before the four countries complete their combat preparations. [NEWLINE]But Utano and Mizu were both vaguely aware of it. [NEWLINE]"This is too...!"[NEWLINE]It's so unreasonable, I think it's impossible. [NEWLINE]But Utano smiled reassuringly. [NEWLINE]"That's great...truly. The three years we've persevered haven't been in vain."
(you have a large number of improved plots)
Shiratori Utano likes civs with lots of improved tiles

Mizuto Fujimori is a very weak and honest girl. Probably because the relationship between her parents and grandparents was not good before she was sensible, which caused her to be too observant of the people around her. She is not good at self-advocacy, and is often said to have a dark personality and don't know what she is thinking. This caused her to lose her self-confidence, become more depressed, and lose her self-confidence again...the vicious circle continues.
The city is protected from natural disasters, each flood will provide 1 [ICON_Food] food to the affected cells
I'll avoid it because I'm afraid of bugs
Farms add 1 [ICON_Faith] faith, plantations add 1 [ICON_Culture] culture
Each Sim provides 0.2 [ICON_Production] Production and 0.5 [ICON_Faith] Faith
Add 20 combat power, builder and Shiratori Utano add 1 [ICON_Charges] usage times
Add 20 combat power, add 1 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route capacity
Add 30 [ICON_Strength] combat power, reduce 5 [ICON_Strength] combat power of nearby enemy units
Would you like to build a friendship between us?
As a brave man, I will not back down, nor will I back down
It's time to root out the threat
Very good, let's try some cucumbers that I grow myself
Now is the plowing time, there is no time to receive
I want to give you something as a gift, it's a fruit that I grow myself
You're no different than Batik [NEWLINE] (condemns you)
Hello, I am Shiratori Utano, the only brave man of Suwa, and also the guardian of Suwa
It's harvest time, want to see our crop
We can exchange addresses so I can contact you too
It seems that you are also a person who enjoys farm work and loves the fields as much as I do
Don't you think it's a pity to let these cultivated land go to waste?
As Batik's attacks intensify, it's time to consider external assistance
Even with so many troops, it's nothing compared to Batik
For Ah Shui and my ideals, this world cannot be destroyed
